meanings.definition: Not relying on others for support or sustenance.
meanings.sent1: She is very independent and nondependents, always taking care of herself.
meanings.sent2: The nondependents individual prefers to handle things on their own without help.
meanings.sent3: The nondependents cat refused to eat the food her owner offered, insisting on catching her own.
meanings.sent4: The tree stood tall and nondependents, drawing nutrients from the soil without assistance.
meanings.sent5: The nondependents student completed the project without asking for any guidance.

meanings.definition: Those who do not rely on others for support or sustenance.
meanings.sent1: In the community, the nondependents are admired for their self-sufficiency.
meanings.sent2: The nondependents in the group always volunteer to help others instead of seeking help themselves.
meanings.sent3: The nondependents at the party brought their own snacks, not wanting to depend on what others brought.
meanings.sent4: She saw herself as a nondependents, always finding her own solutions to problems.
meanings.sent5: The nondependents in the family took pride in their ability to take care of themselves.
